locations.splash: You are in the City Hall Lobby. It is majestic.
You stand before a brick building with Greek gods painted on it

inventory.name: Daniel the Eagle
inventory.description: It is an eagle with sharp talons

inventory.name: Twenty Questions
inventory.description: I'll pick a number between 1 and 1,000. You have 20 questions to guess it.
inventory.splash: I'll pick a number between 1 and 1,000. You have 20 questions to guess it.[20Q]

locations.description: This happy place has birds singing, people playing.
locations.splash: Welcome to Happy Park! What a happy place.
It's Pig Prison, the worst place ever.
You are in the Game Room. Bells ring and machines whir.

inventory.name: Twenty Questions
inventory.description: I'll pick a number between 1 and 1,000. You have 20 questions to guess it.
inventory.splash: I'll pick a number between 1 and 1,000. You have 20 questions to guess it.[20Q]

inventory.name: Cookie Clicker
inventory.description: You click a cookie to gain cookies.
inventory.splash: You click a cookie to gain cookies.[CC]

inventory.name: Go Fish
inventory.description: Play a game of Go Fish against the computer.
inventory.splash: Play a game of Go Fish against the computer.[GF]

inventory.name: Guessing Calculator
inventory.description: I'll give you two whole numbers, and you tell me what their sum is.
inventory.splash: I'll give you two whole numbers, and you tell me what their sum is.[GuessCalc]

inventory.name: Get Out of Pig Prison
inventory.description: Convice your pig warden to let you out of jail
inventory.splash: Convice your pig warden to let you out of jail[GOPP]

inventory.name: Shotgun
inventory.description: Reload, Block, or Shoot, but time it right or you're dead
inventory.splash: Reload, Block, or Shoot, but time it right or you're dead[Shot]

inventory.name: Tic Tac Toe
inventory.description: Play tic tac toe against me, the computer. Don't worry, I'm not very good.
inventory.splash: Play tic tac toe against me, the computer. Don't worry, I'm not very good.[Tic Tac Toe]

route.name: south
route.description: You can return to City Hall
route.splash: City Hall is to the south

route.name: open
route.description: This door has a brass handle. You could open it.
route.splash: You see a heavy door with a brass handle

route.name: east
route.description: You can see a park off to the east

route.name: north
route.description: You can't see very far into the alley
route.splash: A dark alley leads to the north

route.name: games
route.description: The sign says type "games" for some games!
route.splash: A sign says type "games" for some games!

route.name: prison
route.splash: You can also go to prison if you want.

route.name: west
route.description: The gravel walkway leads back to City Hall
route.splash: Head west to go back to City Hall

route.name: back
route.splash: You could go back to City Hall.
